title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to undermine the city's faith in its heroes.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life story of a man with a low IQ who achieves great things through kindness and determination.

title: Inception
description: A thief who enters people's dreams to steal secrets gets the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers reality as he knows it is actually a computer simulation.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to save humanity.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop an alien invasion.

title: Casablanca
description: A cynical expatriate encounters a former lover in Casablanca during WWII and must choose between love and duty.

title: Schindler's List
description: The true story of Oskar Schindler, who saved more than a thousand Jews during the Holocaust.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: A dissenting juror slowly persuades the others to reconsider the evidence in a murder trial.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household and infiltrate their lives.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: An FBI cadet seeks help from an incarcerated cannibalistic serial killer to catch another murderer.

title: City of God
description: Two boys growing up in Rio's slums take diverging paths—one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

title: The Pianist
description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto during WWII.

title: Whiplash
description: An aspiring jazz drummer endures grueling instruction from an abusive conductor to achieve greatness.

title: The Prestige
description: Two magicians in Victorian London engage in a bitter rivalry fueled by obsession and secrets.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: U.S. soldiers search for a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action in WWII.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: Back to the Future
description: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean.

title: Alien
description: The crew of a spaceship encounters a deadly alien lifeform that infiltrates their ship.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in LA.

title: Moonlight
description: A young black man struggles with his identity and sexuality while growing up in Miami.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl enters a fantastical world of spirits and must find a way to save her parents.

title: Seven Samurai
description: A village hires samurai to defend them from bandits during feudal Japan.

title: The Usual Suspects
description: A sole survivor tells the twisted tale of events leading up to a notorious massacre.

title: No Country for Old Men
description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a man stumbles upon two million dollars in the Texas desert.

title: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to solve his wife's murder using tattoos and Polaroids.

title: Amélie
description: A shy waitress decides to change the lives of those around her for the better, while grappling with her own isolation.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A concierge and a lobby boy become involved in a series of misadventures at a famous European hotel.

title: The Social Network
description: The founding of Facebook and the lawsuits that followed between cofounders.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
description: A Mumbai teen reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on a game show.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: Indiana Jones races against Nazis to reclaim the Ark of the Covenant.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father.

title: Alien 3
description: Ripley crash‑lands on a prison planet and confronts a terrifying new alien.

title: Oldboy
description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, a man seeks cinematic revenge.

title: Pan’s Labyrinth
description: A young girl in post‑Civil War Spain escapes into a magical labyrinth full of mythical challenges.

title: Her
description: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: Get Out
description: A young black man visits his white girlfriend’s family estate and uncovers disturbing secrets.

title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
description: An actor famous for playing a superhero struggles to mount a Broadway play in his own life.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist is recruited to communicate with alien lifeforms after mysterious spacecraft appear.
